metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12407 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mozilla Developer Nicolas Silva found that when using WebRender, Firefoxwould under certain conditions leak arbitrary GPU memory to the visiblescreen. The leaked memory content was visible to the user, but notobservable from web content. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 77.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
